summary: AN ORDINANCE concerning indigent public defense services; establishing a process for selecting providers of those services; creating a proposal review panel; setting out standards for those services; establishing contractual requirements for agreements between the City and public defense service providers; requesting the Seattle City Auditor to audit compliance; repealing Ordinance 122493 and Ordinance 121501; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
committee: Public Safety, Governmental Relations and Arts
